name: Tech Exchange
description: Refurbished computers and technology equipment for nonprofits and community organizations; also offers digital training and tech support
fullDescription: Tech Exchange is a Bay Area nonprofit that provides affordable refurbished technology to nonprofits, schools, and community organizations, along with digital training and support.
whatTheyOffer:
- Refurbished computers and laptops at low cost
- Technology equipment for nonprofits and schools
- Digital literacy training programs
- Technical support services
- E-waste recycling
howToGetIt:
1. Visit techexchange.org to browse available equipment
2. Verify your nonprofit or school status
3. Request equipment through the website
4. Schedule pickup at their Oakland location or arrange delivery
